website_summaries.verdict: Consider the MegaRed supplement if you just want a small dose of omega-3s each day.
pros: Omega-3s are readily absorbed by the body
The pills won't leave you with a fishy aftertaste
cons: This pill only offers 350 mg of krill oil per serving, which is much less than most other krill oil supplements

customer_reviews.title: DO IT FOR YOURSELF . . .
customer_reviews.text: I'm a well person. I've taken Schiff's MegaRed for years now. I also use Schiff's MoveFree. That I'm 80 comes as a big surprise to me; if I acted my age, I'd probably be dead now. Try these products and be prepared to feel better and probably live longer feeling well . . .
customer_reviews.author: PHOEBE HOPPER

customer_reviews.title: is my health in danger
customer_reviews.text: FAKE PRODUCT FROM AMAZON ?I bought this in November 2019 and just refilled the order in March of 2020. I got an E Mail from Amazon yesterday that said it was a FAKE product and advised me to through it away and they have issued a refund. What have I been taking daily since November of 2019 ? Has my health been compromised ? How do I find out ?
customer_reviews.author: Judy K.

customer_reviews.title: The Mega Red don't burp up any fishy taste (which is great when you work closely with the public
customer_reviews.text: This is something we take daily for our health! The Mega Red don't burp up any fishy taste (which is great when you work closely with the public.)
customer_reviews.author: Rita Brand

customer_reviews.title: Great value taste and smell
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. I just returned some rancid fish oil to amazon that was the Carlson brand and purchased these instead and I am very happy I did. They do have a very pleasant vanilla taste. I also read that krill oil is better absorbed by the body vs fish oil and it also isn’t as susceptible to going rancid like regular fish oil. If you are on the fence about these I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie A.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: the product almost expired ,i cannot eat it in time, please reship them with new production date. thanks.
customer_reviews.author: duanhongtao

customer_reviews.title: No fishy taste!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a vitamin consumer but my eye doctor recommended these for my dry eyes. These are easy to take with no fishy taste and no issues with upset stomach or any thing. Too soon to tell if they are helping with my dry eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Menika Sellars

customer_reviews.title: Contributes to the starvation of whales!
customer_reviews.text: While there is no evidence fish oil or krill oil does everything claimed, what is true is buying this product contributes to the starvation our whales. We have a responsibility to ourselves AND all living things. I'm sad to say I blindly bought this product without realizing I was hurting others. I will not buy any fish or krill oil again.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: For my cat
customer_reviews.text: This formula works really well. I give my cat the oil from 1 capsule each morning in her food. She has a vestibular syndrome that causes wobbling and balance problems. Since using this krill oil she’s made a drastic improvement. Works very quickly. Edit: My kitty has improved so much I give her the oil of half a capsule every morning.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Chicken Lady

customer_reviews.title: Small is better
customer_reviews.text: Have difficulty swallowing large pills. There fit the bill. Started on one a day, but after several years my primary care physician suggest I take two a day. Has really helped my skin and my physician is a strong believer in omega-3.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Noah

customer_reviews.title: They told me they were fake
customer_reviews.text: Out of the blue, Amazon refunded my money without me asking, and it had been weeks- they told me the product was not genuine, and to throw them out. At first I thought "why not keep using them?" and then I realized for two reasons, they might not be effective, and they might not be safe. Trashed them.
customer_reviews.author: LovePrime

customer_reviews.title: FOR YOUR HEALTH!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second time ordering this from Amazon, and I will continue to do so in the future. The product is exactly as described, and the shipping is timely and well packaged. It is exactly as described, as are the product's benefits. I highly recommend them to anyone concerned about their nutritional health, especially their intake of Omega-3's....
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: My Doctor-Recommended Brand
customer_reviews.text: MegaRed Omega 3 Krill Oil is my doctor-recommended brand. Small pill easy to swallow and only have to take one each day. They brought my cholesterol numbers closer to normal. I recommend this product to anyone who just want to be proactive about their health. Will purchase again because it works.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Had me running to the toilet.
customer_reviews.text: I’m no stranger to krill oil or fish oil since I’ve taken them daily for a few years now. I normally interchange between fish and krill monthly. I tried this brand in krill oil and was not pleased. My diet stayed the same except for this new addition which immediately gave me the runs. I stopped taking it for a week then I was back to normal, started it again and the problem came back. I won’t be using the remaining supply that I have, I prefer not to crap myself. Make an informed buying decisions.
customer_reviews.author: Ric

customer_reviews.title: GURU
customer_reviews.text: I started taking these about two months ago. It was recommended due to my arthritis in my hip. With that said, i didn't want to add more pills to my morning routine, so i take two of them at night. I have noticed, along with my other vitamins i take, that i do not wake up in the middle of the night with pain. Granted, i do take melatonin, tart cherry (highest dosage possible) and a Tylenol PM...which i used to take 5 to sleep, now i am down to three. This works, and my overall 'feeling' good has increased. You have to find the concoction that works for you, not based on a book or even your Dr.
customer_reviews.author: Purrteegrl

customer_reviews.title: got for the dog
customer_reviews.text: 1000mg fish oil pill gave our dogs the runs ( which is all I can find in the stores). This is small enough that he eats it and we noticed a difference in the way he moves after 2 days (without the gross side affects). We now have cut back to 2-3 a week and he is not in pain anymore after a day of running and playing. Exactly what we were looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Reader

customer_reviews.title: Small tablet, doesn't stink/taste bad.

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth it!

Thanks, these are great and we've made the switch permanent at our house.

customer_reviews.title: Beware of bruising!! Best choice yet though for vitamin E!
customer_reviews.text: Okay. Be careful. I live for this product but noticed I've been getting larger bruises--not uncommon with high vitamin E. Just take every other day or hold off if the bruising is severe. My whole leg bruised from scratching after an itch! Be careful and gentle! Don't forget crazy with this supplement!

customer_reviews.title: Really good Omega 3s. Have purchaed 2x
customer_reviews.text: Easy to take each day. Recent Research says to take at Night as well to avoid Strokes/Blood Clots that often occur between 4:00 & 6:00 in the Morning. Probably need more research to confirm that, but seems logical. My Dad had his Deadly Stroke at 4:30 AM.

customer_reviews.text: There's no fishy taste or burping after taking these. I also tried one on an empty stomach rather than with a meal. Even then there was no bad taste. That's great. However, after buying here, I found them in a local store at a substantially lower cost. It's worth shopping around.

customer_reviews.title: Small and easy to take, but not for me.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try these omega-3 supplements because I was looking for a smaller pill, and had heard krill oil is supposed to be higher quality. These are quite small and have a nice smell/flavor that is not at all fishy. Unfortunately they caused me to break out so I will not continue taking them. For the record, many types of omega 3 do cause me to break out- I've only found a few that don't- so if you've not previously experienced this reaction to omega 3 this may not be an issue for you.

customer_reviews.title: When all is said and done , saving a few cents is not always the best way.

Update: Amazon has still not told me if I am at risk for using this product. Their refund and warning about the product occured almost 3 months after purchase. Maybe Amazon is not equiped to handle over the counter products? Additional update: still no response from Amazon. Maybe all versions of this product are at risk?

customer_reviews.title: There is no fishy smell.
customer_reviews.text: My neighbor has been taking this for half a year, and I bought a course of test on his recommendation. Because of genetic reasons, my blood pressure is higher than that of my friends. I usually take some antihypertensive drugs, but antihypertensive drugs are hormone drugs that can instantly lower blood pressure. If you want to completely cure high blood pressure, you must control your eating habits. Since I started taking this product, my blood pressure has dropped significantly. In addition, I usually eat some low-fat objects, and now I have basically controlled my blood pressure. Thank you very much, Omega.

customer_reviews.title: It dries my eyes
customer_reviews.text: Oh God! I am very honored to know this product. Many years ago, my eyes suffered from severe dryness due to long-term fatigue. Unfortunately, the doctor told me that there is no special method or medicine to cure this symptom. I feel that my life has come to an end. A chance encounter made me realize that this krill oil, unlike other deep-sea fish oil, has almost no fishy smell, and it is still easy to swallow when taking it. After taking it for two weeks, my dry eyes were obviously relieved. Thank you so much for this shrimp oil. May God bless the products to the world.

product_meta.title: MegaRed 350mg Omega-3 Krill Oil - No fishy aftertaste as with Fish Oil 130 ea
product_meta.description: Style:350mgMegaRed 350mg Superior Omega 3 Krill Oil supplements provide an optimal combination of Omega-3 fatty acids and the powerful antioxidant astaxanthin to support your heart health in a once daily softgel. MegaRed 350mg Superior Omega-3 Krill Oil has been shown to significantly increase your Omega-3 index in just 30 days1. To ensure purity, we remove salts and other impurities to provide one of the purest krill oil on the market.THESE STATEMENTS HAVE NOT BEEN EVALUATED BY THE FOOD AND DRUG ADMINISTRATION. THIS PRODUCT IS NOT INTENDED TO DIAGNOSE, TREAT, CURE OR PREVENT ANY DISEASE. 1 Proprietary controlled human clinical study of 300mg MegaRed for improving Omega-3 Index, Aker Biomarine, 2010.
feature_bullets: 100% Pure Antarctic Krill oil, 3 times more pure than regular Krill oil
Heart health support: excellent source of EPA and DHA Omega-3 fatty acids which may reduce the risk of coronary heart disease.1
Easy absorption: carried to your body's cells in phospholipid form so it's easily recognized and absorbed
Only 1 daily softgel with 350mg of pure Krill oil
